body:
Spack lists the md5 hash for libjpeg 9c as 7794e558c60605424fb1025d836fbf47, but
```
$ curl http://www.ijg.org/files/jpegsrc.v9c.tar.gz | md5sum
93c62597eeef81a84d988bccbda1e990
```
There isn't an official hash or a signature on the ijg.org website, or I would have made a pull request to fix it.
title: [libjpeg] Incorrect hash for version 9c
